newsitem.title: UK: UK meals and feeds steadier in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: UK meals and feeds steadier in quiet trade.

text.p: Steadied high protein soymeal prices kept most buyers on the sidelines of the UK meals and feeds market on Thursday.
Ex-mill high pro prices rose by two to three stg a tonne while stores were unchanged to two stg higher following overnight gains in Chicago.
However, most buyers kept to the sidelines.
"Looks like people got it right for once," said one broker following the sharply lower opening in Chicago during Thursday afternoon.
Prices in the rest of the market were unchanged.
Only two trades were reported when cottonseed feed pellets traded on the resale market at 121 stg ex-store Southampton and 122 stg ex-store Teighmouth, both for spot.
